name: Project Xeno
description:
Project Xeno - A simple RPG game where you play as Xeno. She wakes up on an island with no recollection of her past, with only a large sword to protect herself with. Help Xeno escape the island!

Controls:

x - interact with world / attack in battle

z - open menu in overworld

v - magic menu in battle

b - use potion in battle

p - enter battle in overworld

click - scroll through dialogue

All music is mine

All art (except backgrounds) are mine (including the animations)

DO NOT USE MY GAME OR ANYTHING FROM IT WITHOUT PERMISSION

I spent 8 months on this game.

Made on Godot

First time using Godot

Thank you.
